CustomPermissionDependency.name: CustomPermissionDependency
CustomPermissionDependency.description: Represents the dependency between two custom permissions when one custom permission requires that you enable another custom permission.

RequiredCustomPermissionId.description: The ID of the custom permission that must be enabled when CustomPermissionId is enabled.
